topic.title: favorite sandwich recipe
topic.body: hello zero net people care to share what your favourite/favorite sandwich recipe is?

> [qspitzer](#comment_41_1Hc87xHmLsZyaGTQYnx2UmQPKwE1EmgxKX): A nice grilled cheese with tomato soup on the side

classy anon

> [bober](#comment_18_1FUHVG4DhoXuD8Zrz4D7YuCF7w8JtjYve6): you take bread and add butter, cucumber, salt and pepper. then you drink vodka or kvass

never tried this, cucumber is just crunchy water
